titles.title: A bill to amend the joint resolution of June 22, 1942, to provide for the reading of a Tribute to the Flag before the Pledge of Allegiance.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

bill.summary: 6/22/1988--Introduced. Amends provisions of Federal law concerning rules and customs pertaining to the display of the flag of the United States to provide for the optional reading of a tribute to the U.S. flag before the Pledge of Allegiance.
